name: Dance Dance Sona Revolution
description:
Unity Project: The Trilogy is complete!

Made in Unity, Mini game #1 for League of Legends Arcade Skins Match the directions ←↓↑→ with the Sona's Q (Blue) W (Green) and E (Purple) colors

We have completed 3 different songs that Sona from League of Legends is involvoled with :)

Game can be downloaded from here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1t_kb2lH8PQzg9tCK0GJ7yvXbY4DrjkeL/view?usp=shari...
